tidbits.title: Congo Basin
tidbits.description: DR Congo is home to a significant portion of the Congo Basin rainforest, one of the world's largest tropical rainforests, vital for biodiversity and climate regulation.

tidbits.title: Mineral Riches
tidbits.description: The country is abundant in mineral resources, including cobalt, copper, and coltan, yet faces challenges in managing these resources sustainably.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: DR Congo boasts a rich cultural tapestry, with hundreds of ethnic groups, diverse languages, traditional music like soukous, and vibrant artistry.
